jchess.cache

Class RuleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.cache.RuleData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule, IRuleData

    public class RuleData
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRuleData
    This is a container class to store "Rule" related details in cache. It actually maps XML or DB structure for "Rule" to memory.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
